instruction: I have been editing my document and some words that needed to be rewritten are highlighted in yellow. As I fixed those words, please help me remove all highlight. I want to make sure that there is no highlight word.

minimal: `CLICK` the arrow next to the 'Character Highlighting Color' icon on the Formatting bar.
`CLICK` the box next to No Fill.
`MOUSE_DOWN` on  the beginning position of the whole text.
`DRAG_TO` the last position of the whole text.
batched: `CLICK` the arrow next to the 'Character Highlighting Color' icon on the Formatting bar.
`CLICK` the box next to No Fill.
`MOUSE_DOWN` on  the beginning position of the whole text.
`DRAG_TO` the last position of the whole text.
